name: CareerBuilder Jobs Site
seeking: CareerBuilder is a large job platform serving employers, HR professionals, and job seekers, meaning in a JV context they would seek partners who have access to employer audiences—such as HR software vendors, staffing agencies, or business skills training platforms—for co-marketing or data-sharing arrangements. They would be valuable JV partners for anyone selling to hiring managers or large HR departments. Integration or co-promotion partnerships with ATS (Applicant Tracking System) platforms or professional development tools would be most relevant.
who_you_serve: Job seekers, employers, and HR professionals seeking talent acquisition, career development, and business skills resources.
what_you_do: Operates online job search platform connecting employers with job seekers across industries.
offering: Online job board and employer-candidate matching platform for talent acquisition and career development
business_focus: Operates online job search platform connecting employers with job seekers across industries.
